resources.string: Watch a video about Pyotr Mironovich Masherov.
Take a quiz and check your knowledge of different locations of VSU.
Click on the presentation and study the specialities offered by Vitebsk State University named after P.M. Masherov.
Write an essay in English using the language models such as "2nd Conditional sentences" about your future profession and the speciality you plan to enter, and then present it in front of the class.
Study the presentation about Yelnya Ecological Trail and write down new vocabulary in your notebooks.
The task: To consolidate new vocabulary, do a written translation of the presented text into Russian in your notebook.

Take a virtual tour of Vitebsk State University with the help of a teacher. The teacher will be your guide and will accompany the route in English. Follow the link to take a virtual tour of the university.
Take a quiz and check your knowledge of different locations of VSU.
Beforehand, you need to go on a VR-quest to the memorable places of Belarus.\n\nAfter completing the VR-quest, take a quiz in English on historical sights of the Republic of Belarus.
To study ecological tourism in Belarus and tourist routes to natural sites, study the presentation in English about National Parks and State Reserves of the Republic of Belarus.
Prepare a presentation in English about your favourite natural site.
Listen to the audio about international cooperation at the VSU named after P.M. Masherov.
Listen to an audio track in English about the School of Leaders ‘Masherovtsy’.

Task 1: Write down in your notebooks the pronouns you have heard in the audio track and identify their type (personal, possessive, reflexive, relative, etc.).

 Task 2: Translate the motto, the speech, the first verse and the chorus of the Masherovtsy anthem into English, underlining the pronouns.

 Девиз «Машеровцев» - «Будем гореть, чтоб других зажигать!». 
Речёвка «Машеровцев»: 
«Машеровец» – значит, веду за собой, 
Девиз наш по жизни: «На месте не стой!» 
Решаем всегда мы любые задачи. 
Только вперёд, и никак не иначе. 
Гимн Машеровцев: 
Много дорог достоин ты пройти, 
Мы молодые – жизнь – это движение, 
Будем гореть, зажжём других, всё впереди, 
Машеровцы стремятся к новым достижениям! 
В чём наша сила – мы в кругу друзей 
Нам в ВГУ открыты все дороги, 
Докажем делом – вместе мы сильней, 
Своим трудом к вершинам путь мы строим многим!

Мы в трудное мгновение о дружбе не забудем, 
Сменяя поколение в успех мы верить будем! 
Своей мечте верны на долгие года, 
И если Машеровец ты – то это навсегда!
